page.title: 05Intensive Pig Rearing
page.content: Work commences around 7.30am.by putting on water heater,and emptying bins of waste food into boiler,this being allowed to "cook" for two hours,after being brought to the boil.The mixture is then ground into another tank. Wash out bins and wagon,clean out pigs,take any lame ones to slaughter house. Check wagon for diesel before setting off to pick up waste from hotels,restaurants etc. in Leeds,Bradford,Skipton and Settle. On returning take out bins and clean wagon floor. Early evening sees the feeding of the pigs,amounts varying according to age of pig. Regular checks of equipment,methods and hygeine are made by M.A.F.F.
